lines: Pshhh... I am Novv, clutchfather of this nursssery─all the ssspawnlings you sssee here are my children. Other Sssahagin may desire war with the finless ones, but I wishhh only to raise my clutch in peace.
Pshhh... Forename, you are welcome in the nursssery. Ssstay, tell tall tales to the ssspawnlings, and partake of our bounty. There is always more fishhh broth for our shhhorewalker clutchmate!
Pshhh... For shhhame! What is a clutchfather that cannot protect his children!? I will come for you, Bouu, this I ssswear on my life!
Forename... Wheresssoever you journey, you will always be one of the clutch. I am proud to call you daughterssson.
